meaningMnemonic: A <radical>fang</radical> on a <radical>building</radical> shows that it's <kanji>wicked</kanji>. Something wicked probably lives in the building too.
readingMnemonic: You peek inside the <kanji>wicked</kanji> building and a wicked <reading>ja</reading>guar (じゃ) suddenly pounces at you! You let out a sigh of relief when it's stopped by the window, but then... the window opens?! What a wicked building! It's letting the jaguar get you!
